title: Why do i conastly get afkers after uprank?
body: Why is it that as soon i up rank in a division i constantly get an afk or two the next few games? My laning and jungling capabities aren't perfect but i generally win lane/jungle prowess. I can't expect to even have teams that will not be 20-30 cs behind their opponents to mid game can i? I've invested to much of my time into trying to claw at leaving bronze only to be discouraged by unsavory players.
